data.title: Anna Torv Bio, Wiki, Net Worth, Married, Husband, Age, Height
data.meta_description: Who is Anna Torv? Know her bio, wiki, salary, & net worth, dating life, boyfriend, married, husband, age, height, size, ethnicity, and facts.
data.text:
The American Sci-fi, Fringe was a long-hit series that was watched by millions of viewers. Not only that the TRP of Fringe also skyrocketed which brought its cast member into the limelight. Among those members, Anna Torv was the one who played the role of Olivia Dunham an FBI agent in the series.

Anna Torv was born on June 7, 1979, in Melbourne city, Victoria, Australia. Belonging to Australian nationality and Caucasian ethnicity, she was born to parents – Sausan (nee Carmichael) Torv and Hans Torv. She was raised along with a younger brother, Dylan. 44-year-old actress, Anna, did her schooling at Benowa State High School and graduated in 1996. Then, she earned a degree in Performing Arts from Australia’s National Institute of Dramatic Art in 2001.

Quick Wikis

Real Name Anna Torv Birthday June 7, 1979 Birthplace Melbourne, Victoria, Australia Zodiac Sign Gemini Nationality Australian Ethnicity Caucasian Profession Actress Parents Sausan (nee Carmichael) Torv and Hans Torv Age 44 years old Married/Spouse Mark Valley (div) Sibling Dylan Torv Salary $300,000 – $900,000 Net Worth $6 million

Anna Torv Net Worth and Salary

Anna initially began her acting career by playing the role of Ophelia in John Bell’s production of Hamlet in 2003. After a year, she appeared as Nikki Martel on the television drama, The Secret Life of Us. Then, she got the chance to work on audiobooks for Scholastic Australia’s Solo Collection including, Jack’s Owl, Spike, Little Fingers, and Maddy in The Middle.

Not only that, she appeared in the BBC series, Mistresses. But, she came into the limelight by casting the role of Olivia Dunham in TV series called Fringe. To this date, she appeared in The Pacific, Open, Deadline Gallipoli, Secret City, and Stephanie. Since 2016, she is playing the role of FBI consultant, Wendy Carr in the Netflix drama Mindhunter.

Eventually, she got listed for “TV’s 100 Sexiest Women” by BuddyTV four times; she got ranked 16th in 2009, 27th in 2010, 48th in 2011, and 68th in 2012.

As of 2023, Anna Torv holds an estimated net worth of $6 million.

Married To Husband or Single?

The Australian actress, Anna was married to her husband, Mark Valley, who is an actor in a Sci-fi series, Fringe. The lovebirds exchanged their wedding vows on December 2008. On their wedding day, only close celebrities, family and friends were invited.

Anna and Mark first met each other on the set of Fringe. After playing together in the same TV series, their love story began to blossom like a flower. They eventually began dating and were spotted in various places which later took their relationship toward marriage.

Unfortunately, their love life didn’t go along their way so, in 2009, Anna and Mike officially announced their divorce.

Parents, Siblings, and Family

Anna was born in the Torv family to parents Sausan (nee Carmichael) Torv and Hans Torv. Her father was born in Stirling, Scotland to a Scottish mother as her grandparents were of Estonian Descent. Whereas, Anna’s mother was of Scottish Descent.

Anna grew up with a younger brother named Dylan on the Gold coast, Queensland. However, at the age of eight, she estranged from her father.

Anna Torv Height and Weight

Anna stands tall at a height of 5 feet 7 inches and weighs around 58 kg. She has blonde hair and hazel eyes.

Anna Torv is 44 years old, born June 7, 1979.

Anna Torv hails from Melbourne, Victoria, Australia.

Anna Torv is not dating and does not have a boyfriend.

Anna Torv was previously married to her ex-husband, Mark Valley.

Anna Torv earns $300,000 to $900,000 annually.

Anna Torv net worth is $6 million as of 2023.
